title: Switch to a Branch
description: In Git, branches are used to create different versions of a project. Switching between branches is a common task when working with Git. In this lab, you will learn how to switch to an existing branch in a Git repository.

meta.title: Switch to a Branch in Git
meta.description: Learn how to switch to an existing branch in a Git repository.
meta.keywords: version control, switch, repository, git labs, branch, git, git playground

verify.name: Verify that you have switched to the branch
verify.hint: Please make sure you have completed the required actions.

i18n.title: 切换到分支
i18n.description: 在Git中，分支用于创建项目的不同版本。使用Git时，在不同分支之间切换是一项常见任务。在本实验中，你将学习如何切换到Git仓库中的现有分支。

meta.title: 在Git中切换到分支
meta.description: 学习如何切换到Git仓库中的现有分支。
meta.keywords: 版本控制, 切换, 仓库, Git实验, 分支, Git, Git游乐场

verify.name: 验证你已切换到该分支
verify.hint: 请确保你已完成所需操作。
